differences: IS 694 follows similar specifications but with specific Indian conditions. Voltage rating harmonized but testing parameters differ.
tender_compatibility: Often accepted interchangeably in Indian tenders

differences: IS 1554 is more comprehensive covering various cable types. IEC focuses on PVC insulation specifically.
tender_compatibility: IS 1554 preferred in Indian government tenders

differences: Similar voltage ratings but IS 7098 includes tropical conditions testing. BS 6004 is UK-specific.
XLPE insulation standards. IS 9968 includes additional tropical climate tests. IEC is global standard.
IS 10810 specifically for FRLS cables with Indian fire safety norms. IEC 60332 focuses on fire propagation tests.
tender_compatibility: IS 10810 mandatory for high-rise buildings in India

differences: Armoured cable standards. IS 5831 includes specific Indian installation conditions. BS 7846 for UK market.
tender_compatibility: IS 5831 required for underground installations in India

differences: Both cover XLPE cables up to 33kV. IS 8130 includes monsoon and high-temperature testing.
tender_compatibility: IS 8130 preferred by state electricity boards

differences: Crosslinked polyethylene standards. IS 13573 adapted for Indian voltage systems and climate.
